```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# process_data.R
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Load data
stations_data <- readRDS("stations_data.rds")
n_sf <- readRDS("n_data.rds")

# Convert to sf objects
stations_sf <- st_as_sf(stations_data, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)

# Plot stations and neighborhoods
plot <- ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = n_sf, color = alpha("black", 0.5), fill = "white") +
  geom_sf(data = stations_sf, color = "red", size = 1.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )

# Save the plot as a PNG file
ggsave("stations_neighborhoods.png", plot = plot, width = 10, height = 10)

# Save the plot as a JPG file
ggsave("stations_neighborhoods.jpg", plot = plot, width = 10, height = 10)
```
